sentences: Küll teevad pika näo, kui kuulda saavad, et nad on pärandist ilma jäetud.
Jäi minejatele pika näoga järele vahtima.
Poistel on näod pikad, kui kuulevad.
context: The phrase 'näoga' in combination with 'pika' (long) forms an expression meaning to have a long face or to appear disappointed. This typically occurs when someone receives bad news, is left out of something expected, or faces some kind of disappointment that causes them to look unhappy or crestfallen.
